messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Chief Engineer's Desk
messages.body: SSSupermatter Engine isss online, if you continue to have power isssuesss contact engineering

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Research Initiatives

Cargo: Your station has been chosen for an epidemiological research project. Send us your cargo shuttle to receive your research samples.

messages.author: Head of Security's Desk
messages.body: Greg chill yo, iz fine. just a misunderstanding. dont shoot the fucker

messages.author: Head of Security's Desk
messages.body: Ok boys, we got mother fuckin vines takin our jobs and shit. so were going to domestically terrorize the shit out of it. if ya ant doin shit, your now doin this.

messages.author: Head of Security's Desk
messages.body: Ok, fuck this. DROP WHAT YOUR DOING, and deal with the vines and larvae. Im in Shitcurity mode now and i ant dealin with this on THIS station.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Find who caused the plasma fire and execute them

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.
